content.description: Birth Rates and Death Rates for Selected Regions
content.question: Region Birth Rate in 2017 (per 1,000 population) Death Rate in 2017 (per 1,000 population) South Asia 22 6 Eastern Europe 11 13 North America 14 7 East Asia 12 7 North Africa 28 6 Source: Population Reference Bureau Based on the demographic transition model, which region is best described as exhibiting overall negative rates of growth in stage 4?

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
